beginning.dialogue:
You are an antique hunter, and a good one at that. You've fallen on hard times, 
you haven't had any big finds in a while. You get a tip of a house that is incredibly old, 
and has a high chance of having antiques.It is located in a clearing in the middle of an ancient forest. 
But apparently it is the lair of a terrible beast, one that scares away all who try to loot the place. 
With nothing to lose, and not believing in folktales, you decide to explore this old house. 
You make your way deep into the forest...

level1.dialogue:
You finally make it to the front door of the decrepit house. All the house's wooden walls are gray with age,
 and it looks like the roof will collapse at any moment. But you gather your nerves and turn the door handle.
 As you step in to take a look around, the smell of mold and mildew attacks your nose.
 "This definitely can't be good for my health", you think to yourself.
level1.action1: 1) Look around for a light switch.
level1.event1:
You look around for a light switch but you realize the house in the middle of nowhere, 
and probably too old to have electricity.
level1.action2: 2) Look for a lantern or torch you can light.
level1.event2: You scan around for a lantern but find nothing except cobwebs and old pieces of wood, probably from the house itself.

level2.dialogue:
After scanning the main room for a while, a pleasent smell suddenly wafts towards your face.
 You turn your head to an old table, and are surprised to find a delicious-looking spread of food on it.
 On a bookshelf, there sits an old book.
level2.action1: 1) You sit down on the wooden chair at the table and eat a meal.
level2.event1: The food tastes as good as it smells, and now you're completely stuffed.
level2.event2:
The book is an old novel, and you think it may be worth something, so you decide to keep it. 
Out of curiousity, you start to read the first few pages.

level3.dialogue: You walk into another room and see a globe of the world on an old dresser, with a broken mirror hanging on the wall
level3.action1: 1) You walk up to the dresser to get a closer look at the globe.
level3.event1: It is indeed a globe of the Earth, you decide to take the globe.
level3.action2: 2) You walk up to the old, broken mirror to see if you can catch your reflection.
level3.event2:
You see a blurry, foggy reflection of yourself. The mirror appears to have once been an elegant looking glass. 
You decide to take it.

level4.dialogue: You start to feel tired. You can either rest a bit or search the dresser for something.
level4.action1: 1) You decide to take a rest on the floor.
level4.event1:
You sit on the floor in the of corner the dilapidated house, reminiscing on your journey thus far. 
After a while, you decide to get up, feeling refreshed.
level4.action2: 2) You push forward and search the dresser.
level4.event2:
You decide to check the dresser and find a gold pocket watch inside. Itâ€™s old and no longer works, 
but it could likely fetch a decent price.

level5.dialogue:
After spending a good amount of time looking around the house, you decide to take a look outside. 
It is late into the night by now, but through the darkness you are able to make out what seems to be a graveyard with a small pond next to it.
level5.action1: 1) You decide to take a look at the graveyard.
level5.event1:
Getting closer to what you assume are gravestones, you find yourself infront of a quite ancient looking graveyard. 
A thought crosses your mind, "There's probably some nice treasure in these graves." 
The idea lingers for a moment before you push it away. Unsettled by where your mind wandered, you head back inside the house.
level5.action2: 2) You walk closer to the pond to a get a good look at it.
level5.event2:
You approach the still pond. The crickets chirp from the tall grass around you. 
You take in the sight when you suddenly notice something shining beneath the moonlit surface of the pond. 
Already deep into your adventure, you think, "Getting a little wet wouldn't hurt", and dive right in. 
The water is cold and murky, but you feel around the area where the object was and touch something metallic. 
You grab it and swim up for air. With a loud gasp, you grab your breathe and look at what your holding in your hand. 
It turns out to be an old half dollar coin. "This could be worth a fortune," you think, feeling that the dive was well worth it.

level6.dialogue: Since it's getting late into the night, you feel it's almost time to go, but you want to comb the house one more time before leaving.
level6.action1: 1) You find nothing, but you start to miss modern society.
level6.event1: Thinking about whether a new episode of your favorite show has come out, you start heading out.
level6.action2: 2) You find nothing, but you start to think that a shower would feel lovely right now.
level6.event2: Picturing yourself relaxing in a nice hot bath, you take your leave.

end_game.dialogue1:
You exit the house and make your way back through the forest, feeling satisfied with your finds. 
As you reach the edge of the woods, you take one last look back at the old house, now shrouded in darkness. 
You can't help but wonder about the mysteries it holds, but for now, you're content with the treasures you've gathered. 
With a sense of accomplishment, you head back to civilization, eager to see what adventures await you next...
end_game.dialogue2:
As you leave the premises, a sudden wave of light-headedness washes over you. Your vision blurs, and you are on the verge of collapse. 
You try to calm your nerves and gather yourself. The dizziness subsides, and as your sight clears, you find yourself standing in a strange Egyptian-style tomb.
end_game.dialogue3:
All sides are lined with torches and hieroglyphs. A strong vortex started to form, picking up all the sand and making it hard to see. 
Once the swirling subsided, a Sphinx appeared before you, blocking your only way out.
end_game.dialogue4:
Ah, the brave soul who dares venture into my domain! Welcome, traveler, to the realm of riddles and mysteries. 
I am the Sphinx, the guardian of ancient wisdom and the keeper of secrets. To pass through this sacred place, you must prove yourself worthy by answering my riddles. 
Fail, and you shall meet a terrible fate. Now, prepare yourself for the challenges that await ahead!
end_game.dialogue5:
Just kidding! Ha ha ha! I'm not that scary, I'm a Sphinx who just loves jokes and riddles. 
It seems the place you were looting was in a temporal rift between your world and mine! 
Which explains where my lunch went...
end_game.dialogue6:
The rift must have opened and teleported you here! But don't worry, I can send you back home. 
It would be fitting to test if you are indeed worthy of those treasures you stumbled across though. 
As it seems, while being in the temporal rift between your world and mine, those artifacts have acquired some residual magic from me!
 This makes them far more valuable, but far more dangerous in the wrong hands!
end_game.dialogue7:
I will test your worth by way of riddles! Ha ha ha! One of my greatest joys! Don't worry, this should be entertaining for the both of us!... 
By the way, I wasn't kidding about the terrible fate part... So be careful with your answers! Ha ha ha!

bad_end.dialogue1:
You failed to answer the riddles correctly. The Sphinx's eyes glow with disappointment, and a dark aura surrounds you. 
You feel a sudden chill as the Sphinx's voice echoes through the tomb, 'Your lack of wisdom has doomed you.' 
The Sphinx slowly rises to his feet, towering over you as you contemplate your end.
bad_end.dialogue2:
With one swift motion, the Sphinx front kicks you in the stomach. 'Suffer the consequences of your hubris!' You clutch your stomach in pain. 
 You double over gasping for air. As you lay there, staring at the Sphinx's paws, you close your eyes do to the ache in your stomach. 
As you open them again, you find yourself lying on the grass infront of the delapidated house.
bad_end.dialogue3:
You check your backpack and find that all the artifacts you have collected are gone. A slight sense of loss washes over you, but you are just grateful to be alive. 
You decide to leave the area quickly, not wanting to risk another encounter with the Sphinx.
bad_end.dialogue4:
Days later, as you sit on your couch thinking about what could have been, you find yourself disappointed at the events that have transpired. 
You lost the artifacts, items that were even more valuable than you initially thought. 
In the moment, you couldn't think straight to give the correct answers. In hindsight a lot of those riddles were very easy. 
And to top it all off, the "terrible punishment" was anticlimactic...
bad_end.dialogue5:
Over all this was a missed opportunity you would like to forget. Even though you are back to square one, and full of disappointment, 
you continue to search for more opportunites to find antiques, hoping for a better outcome next time....

good_end.dialogue1:
You have answered most of the riddles correctly. The Sphinx's eyes glow with approval, and a warm aura surrounds you. 
You feel a sudden warmth as the Sphinx's voice echoes through the tomb, 'Your wisdom has been rewarded.' 
The Sphinx slowly rises to his feet, towering over you as you contemplate your end.
good_end.dialogue2:
The Sphinx signals you towards a door. As you walk through it you begin to see the familiar surroundings of the delapidated house. 
You check your backpack and find that all the artifacts you have collected are still there, now radiating a faint magical aura.
good_end.dialogue3:
A sense of accomplishment washes over you as you realize that the artifacts you found are now even more valuable than before. 
You decide to leave the area quickly, eager to return to civilization and share your incredible story.
good_end.dialogue4:
Days later, in your fancy new apartment, you sit on your couch thinking about the incredible adventure you had. 
You smile to yourself, knowing that you were able to overcome the challenges presented by the Sphinx and emerge victorious. 
The artifacts you found have made you a wealthy person, and you can't wait to see what other adventures await you in the future....

perfect_end.dialogue1:
You have answered all the riddles correctly. The Sphinx's eyes glow with surprise, and a radiant aura surrounds you. 
You feel an excitement coming from the Sphinx as the Sphinx's voice echoes through the tomb, 'You are indeed worthy of these magic items!' 
The Sphinx slowly rises to his feet, towering over you as you contemplate your end.
perfect_end.dialogue2:
The Sphinx lays both of his giant paws gently on your shoulders. 'You have proven yourself to be wise beyond measure. 
I shall grant you a special boon for your exceptional performance.' With that, a bright light envelops you.
perfect_end.dialogue3:
'Go now,' The Sphinx says, as he signals you towards a door. As you walk through it you begin to see the familiar surroundings of the delapidated house. 
You check your backpack and find that all the artifacts you have collected are still there, now radiating a faint magical aura. 
You seem strangely connected to this magical aura, and ponder about the boon the Sphinx bestowed upon you.
perfect_end.dialogue4:
A sense of accomplishment washes over you as you realize that the artifacts you found are now even more valuable than before. 
You decide to leave the area quickly, eager to return to civilization and share your incredible story.
perfect_end.dialogue5:
Days later, in your old apartment, you sit on your couch thinking about the incredible adventure you had. 
You smile to yourself, knowing that you were able to overcome the challenges presented by the Sphinx and emerge victorious. 
 The artifacts you found seem to hum with a magical energy, and you feel a newfound power coursing through your veins. 
Though you haven't tried using it yet, you know that this power will serve to make your life that much more interesting.
perfect_end.dialogue6:
You look at your housemate, your dog 'Rufus', and say 'Life's about to get a whole lot stranger - in the best possible way, right Rufus?' 
Rufus wags his tail in response.
perfect_end.dialogue7: 'I do believe so,' says Rufus. You both look at each other for a moment and start laughing together, excited for the adventures that lie ahead.
